title: Welcome to Demo Carden
withoutAppointmentDescription: Come today by taking the next available spot in the queue of the professional of your choice.
withoutAppointmentDescription2: Your schedule is given as an indication to improve your comfort, it is subject to change.
withAppointmentDescription: Choose the day and time that suits you best for your appointment.
withAppointmentDescription2: The professional will do their best to respect your scheduled time.
promotionDescription: Add your professional's card to the Carden app to start experiencing unique booking and enjoy exclusive benefits
recoverPoints: Recover the 100 points related to your reservation by downloading the Carden loyalty program app
messageBox1: We are a small team of enthusiasts with a single mission: to save you time and improve your comfort.
messageBox2: There are several ways to support us. We count on you
smsAlert: I wish to receive an SMS alert to notify me of my turn
loyaltyProgram: or receive notifications and earn points by activating the Carden loyalty program
workerAvailable: You're in luck, the selected slot matches the next available slot
termsOnSite: I agree to pay {value} for the booking and understand that I will have to pay for the service directly to {name}.
termsCard: I agree to pay {value} for the booking.
priceIncludingVAT: Price including VAT (tax and fees included)
avaibilityTextCloseWithExternalLink: Want to plan your visit? Book your appointment directly on the partner platform.
avaibilityTextCloseWithoutExternalLink: We are not currently accepting online check-ins. Please check our opening hours.
avaibilityTextFullWithExternalLink: No appointments are currently available. Please wait or book an appointment for another day.
avaibilityTextFullWithoutExternalLink: No availability at the moment. Please wait or contact us again later.
avaibilityTextOpen: Is there an opening today? We've reserved some slots just for you.
lastMinuteText: Last-minute price adjustments are indicated by this symbol.
lowerPriceText: Current offers: Take advantage of reduced rates on a selection of services.
laterInTheDay: Plan for later in the day
bookingAsapText: Take the next available appointment with the professional of your choice.
bestOffersCalculationInfos: Calculated according to the chosen arrival time
popupInfosTextAcompte: The payment of the deposit definitively secures your reservation with the professional.
popupInfosTextFees90: The service fee covers bank transaction fees and SMS reminder fees.
popupInfosTextFees30: The service fees are calculated on the basis of 3% of the total amount of the service (â‚¬65.00), these fees cover bank security and Carden services.
popupInfosTextHours: You reserve a place in the professional's schedule or waiting list. The appointment time is given as an indication only.
popupInfosTextReduction: You benefit from a reduced rate following a promotion from your service provider. This rate is only available online.
popupInfosTextMajoration: You are booking a highly sought-after time slot at the last minute. This supplement guarantees your priority entry.
popupInfosListInfosAcompte1: Deducted from the total amount payable on site
popupInfosWarningMajoration: The deposit paid to the professional is non-refundable in case of cancellation
popupInfosListInfosHours1: Updated according to the actual progress at the show
popupInfosAcompteNote: In case of no-show, this deposit will be refunded to the professional to compensate for the lost time.
